ingredients.ingredient: 3 ¾ cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed

cookingTips: Create steam in the oven by placing a pan of hot water on lower rack - this develops the chewy crust
Score the top of the baguette with a sharp knife before baking to control expansion
High hydration dough creates an open crumb - handle gently to preserve air pockets
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach the baker on achieving authentic French baguette chewiness through steam, proper scoring, and handling the wet dough. Explain how high hydration and minimal fat create the characteristic texture.
